pr_title: KAFKA-9599 create unique sensor to record group rebalance

timeline.bodyText: What about calling it CompletedRebalances to stay inline with OffsetDeletions?
timeline.author: dajac
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -74,7 +74,7 @@ class GroupCoordinator(val brokerId: Int,
       "group-coordinator-metrics",
       "The total number of administrative deleted offsets")))
 
-  val groupCompletedRebalanceSensor = metrics.sensor("OffsetDeletions")
+  val groupCompletedRebalanceSensor = metrics.sensor("group-rebalance")

replies.bodyText:
I suggest to file a Jira for this issue as well as it is a bug. It will help people to find the issue.

https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-9599
replies.author: chia7712

replies.bodyText:
What about calling it CompletedRebalances to stay inline with OffsetDeletions?

sure
replies.author: chia7712
